summary: A docudrama about the efforts of the passengers aboard United Airlines Flight 93 to derail the 9/11 terrorists' plan for the hijacked airliner.
cast: Greg Benson|Toni M. Youngblood|Jason LeGrande|Bryce Wagoner|Kevin Paul|Bryan Friday|Steve Izay|Raj Maan|Ankur Bhatt|Pej Vahdat|Michelle Baldwin|Dick Bennett|Mark Bingham|Robin Bird|Stan Bly|Derril Bodley|Keith Bossier|Phil Bradshaw|Irene Bulhak|Deena Burnett|Tom Burnett|Jerry Butler|Roger Cantu|Robert Cushman|Lenore Cutler|Brian DeCato|Danny Do|Annette Dominguez|Diana Marie Ferra|Dorothy Garcia|Liz Glick|Jack Grandcolas|Lauren Grandcolas|Bea Guadagno|Gerry Guadagno|Lori Guadagno|Larry Hanes|Esther Heymann|Alice Hoglan|Bernie Hourihan|Lisa Jefferson|Holli Joyner|Jessica Kaplan|Arne Kruithof|Phil Ladner|Christy Dawn Little|Tracy Miller|Louis Paul Nacke II|Kenny Nacke|Madden Page|Julia Parker|Lynda Perlman|Bert Rodriguez|Suzanna Sanchez|Victoria Spark|Nefetari Spencer|Kiefer Sutherland|Ben Wainio|Elizabeth Wainio|Sarah Wainio|Robert Wood|Don Worley|Bill Wright
title: The Flight That Fought Back
